title: Post With Code

title: About
text:
I worked as a geoscientist / petrophysicists with ten years of experience in the energy industry. I care about implementing a data-driven workflow in every part of my works, and I believe environmental is as crucial as energy is, in today’s and future’s society. 
I am the person behind plotpetrophysics.xyz. A responsive web application to load a LAS file (a well-log data format), plotting, do some basic petrophysical analysis. Outside of my daily jobs, I enjoyed my time playing music (mostly guitars/drums), reading, or taking care of my FPL. This personal website is where put my thoughts, publications, and whatnot. 
Thanks for dropping by!
